players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm the detective, so he'll try to silence me. I vote to arrest Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob, you’re the only one who stayed silent after the kill. That’s a classic mafia move. I’ve confirmed you’re the mafia. Let’s vote him out before he can silence me again."
You: "I agree with Diana. Bob killed Charlie, is mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie, maybe someone else did. I’m just trying to keep the conversation open and see who’s really suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
